1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: It's day one at Pet School and the kids meet their pet buddies: Sam is thrilled about his corn snake companion, Ysabel is afraid to handle Kitkat the hamster, and Rachel bonds with her bearded dragon. Fresh from Britain's Got Talent, dog trainer Ashleigh and her famous pooch Pudsey drop by for a visit.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The six newest members of the Pet School family emerge in the incubator. One team is tested in the chicken coop. A disappointed Sam searches for a pet buddy substitute. Things get hairy when a tarantula stops by for a visit. Dog trainer Ashleigh and her famous pooch Pudsey share their celebrity-tested tips.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: While one group feeds live locusts to a dragon, checking cats for fleas proves more difficult than expected. Dressed like a giant hamster, Micah gives everyone a big lesson in proper animal care. Celebrity visitor Ashleigh and her famous dog Pudsey give Tej a one-on-one lesson in dog training.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Everyone is thrilled when Mya, the black Labrador puppy comes for a visit. Sam must face his fear of stick insects. An 11foot, 30pound python named Mr. Sunshine stops by. Star of the hit BBC sitcom Outnumbered, Daniel Roche and his dog Peaches get a celebrity introduction to some of Pet School's residents.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The news of a pet buddy shakedown gets mixed reviews. The rats get a new obstacle course. Horse duty proves to be a challenge. In the stock room, Giulia shoulders the heavy lifting. Star of the BBC's Outnumbered, celebrity visitor Daniel Roche walks on the wild side with Pet School's two goats.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: It's week two of Pet School and the kids face even bigger challenges. A trio of hound hunters runs into trouble when an off-leash Kiki starts goat herding. Ysabel conquers her fear of snakes. Micah struggles with canine communication. Strictly Come Dancing's Artem Chigvintsev drops by with his two cats.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Sam takes a back seat at a dragon's breakfast. One group saddles up for an equine challenge, but falls short of the big prize. Rachel learns that escapee chickens don't follow orders. CBBC's Chris and Dodge stop by for a visit. A lucky trio gets a hands-off meeting with Mr. Pinchy the scorpion. Micah is determined to overcome his fears.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: It's day eight and pet practice is getting more intense. One group aces a giant indoor challenge, but leaves everything else in a mess. A chicken coop disagreement leads to team tension. The Best Pet Carer honour comes with a heavy responsibility. The corn snake finally sheds its skin. Star of Dani's House, Klariza Clayton, stops by for a hands-on visit.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: It's day nine and crunch time if the kids want to convince their parents they can manage a pet of their own. It's dinnertime for Elvis the corn snake and Ysabel serves up a defrosted mouse. Sophie reveals the final pet buddy partnerships. In advance of their parents' verdict, the kids each head home with a Pet School report card.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: It's the last day of Pet School and putting all the animal care skills they've learned into action, the kids have just 45 minutes to clean and feed every single animal. The kids say goodbye to their pet buddies for the very last time, and their parents return to Pet School to reveal their final verdict.

imdb.plot outline: On PET SCHOOL, children learn what it really takes to look after animals. For two weeks, nine kids work and play alongside a menagerie of cool creatures. With cameras capturing every hilarious and touching moment, their goal is to convince mom and dad they've got what it takes to have their own animal companion. There's plenty of animal love in every direction and along the way, kids learn practical tips for looking after creatures of all shapes and sizes.
imdb.title: Pet School
plot: On PET SCHOOL, children learn what it really takes to look after animals. For two weeks, nine kids work and play alongside a menagerie of cool creatures.
